amendment.description: To prohibit the National Institutes of Health and any other Federal agency from funding gain-of-function research conducted in China.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2003 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2003 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3408-3409; text: CR S3402) To prohibit the National Institutes of Health and any other Federal agency from funding gain-of-function research conducted in China.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2003 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2003 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1502.
